```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(here)
```



```{r commit 1}
star <- import(here("data", "star.csv"))
star <- star %>% 
  clean_names()
```



```{r commit 3}
star %>% 
  group_by(sex, frl) %>% 
  summarize(math_mean = mean(tmathss), math_sd = sd(tmathss),
         rdg_mean = mean(treadss), rdg_sd = sd(treadss)) %>%
  select(sex, frl, math_mean, math_sd, rdg_mean, rdg_sd) %>% 
  as.tibble()
  
```

```{r commit 4}
star %>% 
  group_by(frl) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(totexp, tmathss))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", aes(color = frl)) +
  labs(
    title = "Relation between teacher experiences and math scores",
    subtitle = "Separate regrression lines displayed by free/reduced price lunch status",
    x = "Teacher Experience (years)", 
    y = "Total Math Sacle Score",
    color = "Lunch status"
    ) +
  theme_minimal()+
theme(legend.position="bottom", legend.box = "horizontal")

    

```
